definition: binding and layout (of a book etc)
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: The essence of bookbinding is its artistry and time spirit.
sentences.chinese: 書籍裝幀設計的藝術性和時代感是它的生命。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter narrated the books design's future.
sentences.chinese: 第五章簡要概敘書籍裝幀的未來發展戰略。

sentences.english: The layout of books and periodicals is essential to the binding design.
sentences.chinese: 書刊的版面設計，是裝幀設計的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Therefore, the way of using colour is extremely important in the decorative art of book.
sentences.chinese: 因而在書籍裝幀中，色彩的運用就顯得尤爲重要。

sentences.english: Miao Wei is from Beijing and graduated from Central Institute of Arts and Crafts with the major of book binding.
sentences.chinese: 北京人，畢業於中央工藝美術學院書籍裝幀專業。

sentences.english: The publishing house decided to bind the new book in leather.
sentences.chinese: 這家出版社決定用皮面裝幀新書。

sentences.english: It is the most outstanding effort in the title page design of BDRC.
sentences.chinese: 封面設計是民國書籍裝幀最突出的成就。

sentences.english: This dictionary is magnificently printed and tastefully appareled.
sentences.chinese: 這部詞典印刷精美，裝幀雅緻。

sentences.english: These volumes are beautifully bound in red cloth.
sentences.chinese: 這些書用紅布封面裝幀得很漂亮。

sentences.english: You can buy framed photos of the new first family.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以買到相框裝幀好的奧巴馬一家的全家福。

sentences.english: The printers have got  the dictionaries up very nicely.
sentences.chinese: 印刷工人把這些詞典裝幀得非常美觀。

sentences.english: Leafage is the forms of Chinese ancient book binding in transition period.
sentences.chinese: “葉子”是古籍過渡時期的裝幀形態。

sentences.english: Book modality from the book binding design evolved.
sentences.chinese: 書籍形態設計是由書籍裝幀設計演變而來的。

sentences.english: Decorative art of book is considered as an integrate subject.
sentences.chinese: 書籍裝幀作爲一門綜合學科。

sentences.english: The quality of this product is extremely striking and buyers can opt for a number of page layouts and finishes.
sentences.chinese: 它的產品質量卓越，買家可以選擇多種版面和裝幀。

sentences.english: All these concepts and notions have been embodied in Chinese book design art.
sentences.chinese: 這些觀點和範疇在我國書籍裝幀藝術中都有所體現。

definition: hardcover (book)/elaborately packaged/opposite: 簡裝|简装[jian3 zhuang1]
book format, similar to in-4°, in-8° etc (a 16-kai format 16開|16开[shi2 liu4 kai1] is roughly A4)/abbr. to 開|开[kai1]
to abridge/to cut a text down to size for publication
paperback/plainly packaged/opposite: 精裝|精装[jing1 zhuang1]
